titles.title: Achieving Our IDEA Act of 2003
To amend the Individuals with Disabilities Education Act to fully fund 40 percent of the average per pupil expenditure for programs under part B of that Act.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and the Workforce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Education Reform.

committee.name: House Committee on Education and the Workforce

bill.summary: 3/20/2003--Introduced. Achieving Our IDEA Act of 2003 - Amends the Individuals with Disabilities Education Act (IDEA) to authorize and make appropriations for: (1) each of FY 2004 through 2009 in specified amounts; and (2) each subsequent fiscal year, in amounts necessary to fully fund 40 percent of the average per pupil expenditure for IDEA part B programs of assistance for education of all children with disabilities.
